review:
Two fresh and most beatifull girl in the planet was in the moovie
Realistic song "kisi se tum pyar karo to phir ijhar karo" aaj kahna jaroori hai
when i seen first time this moovie that was jun 2003 first barsat ke din so aayega mazaa ab barsat ka was like a heaven
And rabba ishq na hoye was in new heights of moovie all song is lovely
Best Romantic love story. heart touching emotional story
iseee  nahi dekha to kya dekha

This is the first movie of priyanka chopra. Iss film ka sab se badi baad hai uska gaana. Each and every song of this movie is really good. Akshay justice his role as well as lara. Priyanka first movie but nobody understood after seeing her acting in this movie that this was her first time movie. I love this movie.
Very nice  film and jis  ladki  se  pyaar  karate  ho vha miljhe  yhe   kamnakarta hu   all the best  all  friends  thank you  God bless you

I was 15 or 16 then, it was a comeback film of Akki ji.. I didn't watch this movie due to my Secondary Exam of Board.But Lara Dutta & Priyanka Chopra were the newcomers in the film and both were very attractive .
Very very heart touch movie life ke sach sikhati hai.salute Lara dutta Mam acting.priyanka chopra's climax part sooo touching.
